name: lokale_Daten_Relia
description: Verbindungen zum SQL-Server und zu den Relia-Daten

pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Relia_Daten_interneFehler = let
  Source = Sql.Database("lbksql_Service", "Lbk_Service_DB", [Query = "Select * From Relia_Daten_interneFehler Where [ProductFamily] is not null"]),
  #"Calculated date" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"FirstShipmentDate", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date", {{"RL_ShipDate", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 2" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date 1", {{"Rep_Received", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 3" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date 2", {{"Rep_Finished", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Calculated date 3", {{"Wellenlaenge", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
shared Relia_Daten = let
  Source = Sql.Database("lbksql_Service", "Lbk_Service_DB", [Query = "Select * From Relia_Daten where [ProductFamily] is not null"]),
  #"Calculated date" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"FirstShipmentDate", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date", {{"RL_ShipDate", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 2" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date 1", {{"Rep_Received", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Calculated date 3" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Calculated date 2", {{"Rep_Finished", each DateTime.Date(_), type date}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Calculated date 3", {{"Wellenlaenge", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
shared #"Relia_Daten-zumTesten" = let
  Source = Relia_Daten,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"description1", "ProductFamily", "ShipToCustomer", "SystemSerialNr", "Rep_BetriebsStd", "Rep_BetriebsStdDelta", "FirstShipmentDate", "RL_ShipDate", "Rep_Received"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns", {"Rep_TabServiceID", "SerialNr", "Item", "commodityCode", "KopfPN", "Rep_EntitComp", "Rep_FailureCommodityCode", "Rep_FailureClass", "Rep_Failure", "Rep_FailureComment", "Rep_FailureClassIntern", "Rep_FailureIntern", "Rep_FailureInternComment", "Rep_Finished", "RL_RepNeu", "RL_SNRowNr", "Rep_ID", "Rep_SR", "SR_Fehlerursache_ltKunde", "RR_SR_Fehler_ltEingangstest", "RR_SR_VorbeugendeMaßnahme", "RR_SR_ContainmentAction", "RR_SR_RootCause", "N_ShipDate", "Wellenlaenge", "Leistung_mW", "TechFam", "OrgForecastField", "Leistungsklasse", "Lasertyp_prodplan", "zaehlenFuerStatistiken", "OTDGruppe", "ForecastField"}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"Item", "SerialNr", "KopfPN"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns 1", each [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54059 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54055 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54069 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54120 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 56183 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54113),
  #"Removed columns 2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"Rep_EntitComp"})
in
  #"Removed columns 2";
shared #"Relia_Daten_interneFehler (2)" = let
  Source = Relia_Daten_interneFehler,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"description1", "ProductFamily", "ShipToCustomer", "SystemSerialNr", "Rep_BetriebsStd", "Rep_BetriebsStdDelta", "FirstShipmentDate", "RL_ShipDate", "Rep_Received"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns", {"Rep_TabServiceID", "SerialNr", "Item", "commodityCode", "KopfPN", "Rep_EntitComp", "Rep_FailureCommodityCode", "Rep_FailureClass", "Rep_Finished", "RL_RepNeu", "RL_SNRowNr", "Rep_ID", "Rep_SR", "SR_Fehlerursache_ltKunde", "RR_SR_Fehler_ltEingangstest", "RR_SR_VorbeugendeMaßnahme", "RR_SR_ContainmentAction", "RR_SR_RootCause", "N_ShipDate", "Wellenlaenge", "Leistung_mW", "TechFam", "OrgForecastField", "Leistungsklasse", "Lasertyp_prodplan", "zaehlenFuerStatistiken", "OTDGruppe", "ForecastField"}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"Item", "SerialNr", "KopfPN"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns 1", each [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54059 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54055 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54069 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54120 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 56183 or [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54113),
  #"Removed columns 2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"Rep_EntitComp"}),
  #"Reordered columns 1" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns 2", {"Hauptfehler", "Rep_TabServiceID", "commodityCode", "Rep_FailureCommodityCode", "Rep_Failure", "Rep_FailureClass", "Rep_Finished", "RL_RepNeu", "RL_SNRowNr", "Rep_ID", "Rep_SR", "SR_Fehlerursache_ltKunde", "RR_SR_Fehler_ltEingangstest", "RR_SR_VorbeugendeMaßnahme", "RR_SR_ContainmentAction", "RR_SR_RootCause", "N_ShipDate", "Wellenlaenge", "Leistung_mW", "Bemerkung", "Beschreibung", "TechFam", "OrgForecastField", "Leistungsklasse", "Lasertyp_prodplan", "GruppierungFuerAuswertung", "zaehlenFuerStatistiken", "OTDGruppe", "ForecastField"}),
  #"Removed columns 3" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns 1", {"Rep_Finished", "RL_RepNeu"}),
  #"Reordered columns 2" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns 3", {"Rep_ID", "Hauptfehler", "Rep_TabServiceID", "commodityCode", "Rep_FailureClass", "Rep_Failure", "Rep_FailureCommodityCode", "RL_SNRowNr", "Rep_SR", "SR_Fehlerursache_ltKunde", "RR_SR_Fehler_ltEingangstest", "RR_SR_VorbeugendeMaßnahme", "RR_SR_ContainmentAction", "RR_SR_RootCause", "N_ShipDate", "Wellenlaenge", "Leistung_mW", "Bemerkung", "Beschreibung", "TechFam", "OrgForecastField", "Leistungsklasse", "Lasertyp_prodplan", "GruppierungFuerAuswertung", "zaehlenFuerStatistiken", "OTDGruppe", "ForecastField"}),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Reordered columns 2", each [Rep_TabServiceID] = 54113)
in
  #"Filtered rows 1";
